Comment: Abilities: ANdh (Drunken Haze), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Drenches enemy units in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced by 55%, and have a 60% chance to miss on attacks. When units with Drunken Haze cast on them are hit by Breath of Fire, they will ignite and take burn damage. |n|cffffcc00Lasts <ANdh,Dur4>(5 for Heros) seconds.
